mapper.select: select a.id, b.id as student_profile_id, a.task_no, b.name as student_name, c.name as grade_name, d.name as class_name, a.status, a.submit_time, a.risk_level from lvye_assessment_user_task a left join lvye_student_profile b on a.user_id = b.user_id left join system_dept c on b.grade_dept_id = c.id left join system_dept d on b.class_dept_id = d.id where a.task_no = #{taskNo} and a.deleted = 0
select count(*) from lvye_assessment_user_task where task_no = #{taskNo} and deleted = 0
select count(*) from lvye_assessment_user_task where task_no = #{taskNo} and status = #{status} and deleted = 0
